trans-unit.source: Represents the configuration section for Web proxy server usage.
This class cannot be inherited.
This class corresponds to the [\<defaultProxy\> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/defaultproxy-element-network-settings.md) configuration element.
This class is used to access information about the Web proxy server used for requests made with the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> and <xref:System.Net.WebClient> classes.
The following table describes the configuration elements contained in the <xref:System.Net.Configuration.DefaultProxySection> configuration section.
Element
Description
Identifies the Web proxy server to use.
Identifies resources that are not retrieved using the proxy server.
Identifies a custom <xref:System.Net.IWebProxy> implementation.
This class provides programmatic access to information that can be stored in configuration files.
The <xref:System.Net.Configuration.DefaultProxySection> settings apply only to the default proxy server.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.DefaultProxySection"></xref> class.
Gets the collection of resources that are not obtained using the Web proxy server.
The <xref:System.Net.Configuration.BypassElementCollection> returned by this property contains one <xref:System.Net.Configuration.BypassElement> for each resource that bypasses the Web Proxy server.
A <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.BypassElementCollection"></xref> that contains the addresses of resources that bypass the Web proxy server.
Gets or sets whether a Web proxy is used.
`true` if a Web proxy will be used; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the type information for a custom Web proxy implementation.
The <xref:System.Net.Configuration.ModuleElement> returned by this property identifies the type, assembly, and version of a custom <xref:System.Net.IWebProxy> implementation.
A <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.ModuleElement"></xref>.
The type information for a custom Web proxy implementation.
Gets the URI that identifies the Web proxy server to use.

The <xref:System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement> returned by this property identifies the Web proxy server to use for resources that are not in the <xref:System.Net.Configuration.DefaultProxySection.BypassList%2A> collection.
A <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.ProxyElement"></xref>.
The URI that identifies the Web proxy server.
Gets or sets whether default credentials are to be used to access a Web proxy server.
`true` if default credentials are to be used; otherwise, `false`.
